name: laparoscope

a long thin tube put into a cut made in the body in order to examine inside the body or carry out an operation: A miniature video camera was connected to the laparoscope and this showed a clear image on a monitor. The laparoscope is passed in and the doctor can angle it to get a clear view. Related word
laparoscopy
More examplesFewer examplesThe laparoscope is a slender tube that allows the surgeon to see inside the body.The laparoscope can be used as both a diagnostic and operative instrument.In this type of surgery, your doctor uses a laparoscope to see and remove the prostate.
